sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 2 - For Each➛...➛First name,

As you requested, we are sending a courtesy reminder about a To Do item that is due tomorrow.

To Do item: 2 - For Each➛...➛To do item.

Project: 2 - For Each➛...➛Project

Thanks for checking.
